gr.unipi.photoapp.fragments

Class Camera2Fragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • gr.unipi.photoapp.fragments.Camera2Fragment

  • public class Camera2Fragment
extends Fragment
    A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain this fragment must implement the Camera2Fragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener interface to handle interaction events. Use the newInstance() factory method to create an instance of this fragment. Integrate with sensors Gyroscope, (Accelerometer, Magnetometer) Compass, also with Gps Service to provide extra info about the captured image
